includeLayers.description: The purpose of the project is to develop consensus about a regional floodplain “footprint”, i.e. extent, and assess the condition within the extent across all (17) major rivers in the Puget Sound to help monitor progress in protecting and restoring floodplain function.

includeLayers.name: prism_gis_v.PSP.Combined_Regional_Pilot_BaselineExtent_diss
includeLayers.description:
The Combined Regional Pilot Baseline Extent layer was developed as part of the Partnership’s Floodplain Vital Sign Data Refinement Project. The purpose of the project is to develop consensus about a regional floodplain “footprint” and assess the condition of the floodplain across all (17) major rivers in the Puget Sound to help monitor progress in protecting and restoring floodplain conditions. This layer represents the baseline floodplain extent layer for 2011. Specifically, this combined layer represents the integration of the 3 pilot watersheds (Green-Duwamish, Stillaguamish and Dungeness) with the 14 other watershed conditions assessments. This dataset is a dissolved version of the original available Here

Also see this map service.

includeLayers.name: FloodplainCondAssess_L1_wm
includeLayers.description: This layer represents the relative condition of the floodplain within the floodplain extent layer based on the combined factors of: connectivity, land use and land cover for a baseline condition for 2011. Also see this map service.
